title: This 'cider donuteur' has made a map to help you find the best cider donuts
description: The New England Cider Donut Map is exactly what it sounds like, a resource to help you get access to the fall confection.

title: After two weeks of chaos, House to vote on Jim Jordan for Speaker of the House
description: The House is set to vote this afternoon on the nomination of Rep. Jim Jordan, R-Ohio, to be Speaker of the House.

title: It's not a place many people choose to be buried — but it was perfect for him
description: When Noah Creshevsky learned he was dying of cancer, he declined medical treatment. Soon, he and his husband David were faced with another decision: what would become of his body?

title: How gas utilities used tobacco tactics to avoid gas stove regulations
description: Gas stoves emit potentially harmful pollutants, but utilities and their trade group avoided regulation with tactics perfected by the tobacco industry to cast doubt on science showing health problems.

title: Gunman kills 2 Swedes in Brussels, prompting a terror alert and halting a soccer game
description: Belgian police hunted Tuesday for a gunman with suspected terrorist motives who killed two Swedes. Authorities shut down a Belgium-Sweden soccer match and held 35,000 fans for hours as a precaution.
